definitions.definition: To subject (a film or plate ) to photographic hypersensitization , chiefly as a technique in astrophotography .
To expose (an animal) to a disease-causing organism , to promote hyperimmunity .

main_definition: ( transitive , photography ) To subject (a film or plate ) to photographic hypersensitization , chiefly as a technique in astrophotography .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To expose (an animal) to a disease-causing organism , to promote hyperimmunity .
